item.title: Encrypted Remote Backup using duplicity
item.description: Introduction My Data is currently stored on a 5 bay Synology NAS running a SHR RAID. All data is periodically backed up to a external hard drive using HyperBackup. This way my data is safe from a RAID failure. BUT what if the data gets mechanically destroyed or a virus encrypts all data on the NAS? An off-site backup solution must be found. Requirements Off-site backup at low to no cost therefore cloud services are expelled Data transfer over SSH because security Data encryption!
